messages.subject: conference raffle!!
messages.msgSnippet: I know I haven t been available online lately, very sorry about that. I want to give a quick plug to the raffle for the upcoming conference though!! If you
messages.messageBody:
I know I haven't been available online lately, very sorry about that.
I want to give a quick plug to the raffle for the upcoming conference
though!!
If you have an interesting/fun or unique item to donate for this
awesome unschooling event, please contact me ASAP.:) Donations can
be brought to the conference if you're attending, or I can give you
an address if you'd rather mail it.
In the past, items have varied from handmade to corporate donations,
magazine subscriptions, games etc... the more variety, the better.

All of the proceeds from this raffle support the scholarship fund!

Please think about donating something....it's greatly appreciated.

For more information about the conference, visit
LiveandLearnconference.org.

Thanks a million!!

Ren
starsuncloud@...
